entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hardy Airport 05:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 89 %

Wind: ESE 52 km/h gust 71 km/h

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 mm except 15 mm near Port Alice. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 mm except 10 mm near Port Alice. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the morning. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023
